dcterms:creator: R. Wang
Y. Zhang
J. Mao
C. Cheng
J. Wu
dcterms:description: The LEGO Error Correction Assembly Dataset (LEGO-ECA) is constructed for the single-step assembly error correction task, comprising 1,429 LEGO assembly manuals, each containing 2D illustrations of assembly steps and various possible assembly failure examples.
dcterms:title: LEGO Error Correction Assembly Dataset (LEGO-ECA)

dcterms:creator: R. Wang
Y. Zhang
J. Mao
C. Cheng
J. Wu
dcterms:description: The Synthetic LEGO Dataset comprises 9,000 LEGO manuals, each presenting a step-by-step instruction sequence for adding new components to an existing LEGO shape.
dcterms:title: Synthetic LEGO Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Mo
S. Zhu
A. X. Chang
L. Yi
S. Tripathi
L. J. Guibas
H. Su
dcterms:description: PartNet is a large-scale benchmark for fine-grained and hierarchical part-level 3D object understanding, consisting of 573,585 part instances across 26,671 3D models covering 24 object categories.
dcterms:title: PartNet

dcterms:creator: R. Wang
Y. Zhang
J. Mao
R. Zhang
C. Cheng
J. Wu
dcterms:description: The IKEA-Manual dataset consists of annotated IKEA objects and assembly manuals, comprising realistic 3D assembly objects paired with human-designed manuals, parsed in a structured format.
dcterms:title: IKEA-Manual
